name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Data Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering AI and ML-driven applications across the healthcare and financial sectors. Adept in **Python** and skilled in developing deep learning models with proven abilities in utilizing **GPU** for enhanced performance. Demonstrated expertise in generating impactful insights through research and analysis while maintaining a strong focus on cloud technologies, specifically deploying solutions on **AWS** and **Azure**. Experienced in mentoring junior developers and leading technical teams to achieve strategic goals while ensuring compliance with industry standards.

Proficient in building scalable systems incorporating **ML**, especially leveraging frameworks and tools such as **FastAPI**, **Django**, **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**. Strong communicator, able to translate complex technical concepts into actionable strategies, ensuring alignment and collaboration across various stakeholders.

experience.responsibilities:
• Demonstrated advanced expertise in **Cloud** and **AI** by deploying ML models for risk scoring, fraud detection, and document classification using **Python** with libraries like **scikit-learn**, **PyTorch**, and **TensorFlow**. 
• Provided **Technical Leadership** in the development of data infrastructure using **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, and **Redis**, designed for heavy data ingestion and real-time analytics, serving over **1,000** users across health and finance domains. 
• Mentored junior team members in **Deep Learning** techniques and **ML** methodologies, enhancing team capabilities in model training and deployment strategies, with a focus on production environments. 
• Designed and optimized **ML** workflows using **MLflow** and **DVC**, ensuring efficient management of model training and validation pipelines across **3** different environments, leading to a **30%** reduction in deployment time. 
• Collaborated effectively, utilizing outstanding **Communication** skills to work closely with ML teams for integrating intelligent features into frontend applications, such as predictive health alerts and personalized dashboards. 
• Led research initiatives to adopt **GPU** acceleration for model training, increasing processing speed by up to **50%** in high-volume data scenarios. 
• Implemented robust testing strategies across the data stack using tools such as **Jest**, **Cypress**, and **PyTest**, ensuring high code quality and reliability with over **95%** test coverage. 
• Managed and executed **Technical Mentoring** sessions, fostering a culture of continuous learning and knowledge sharing within the team, improving overall project delivery efficiency. 
• Ensured data integrity and availability with advanced querying capabilities integrated with **Azure Cognitive Search** and **Elasticsearch**, supporting fast access to structured and unstructured datasets. 
• Spearheaded the adoption of **Deep Learning** frameworks and best practices within the team, driving innovation in data processing and analysis methodologies.

Demonstrated **Technical Leadership** by mentoring junior team members and driving innovative solutions in **Machine Learning (ML)** and **Deep Learning** initiatives, focusing on enhancing data-driven decision-making processes.
Leveraged **Python** for building scalable data pipelines and developing robust models, ensuring optimal performance in data processing and analysis.
Implemented advanced **AI** algorithms and frameworks, delivering cutting-edge solutions that improved predictive analytics accuracy by **30%**.
Collaborated effectively across teams, showcasing strong **Communication** skills to convey complex data concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Conducted **research** on emerging trends in the **Cloud** ecosystem, integrating best practices to optimize resource utilization and reduce costs by **15%**.
Designed and developed infrastructures for **GPU**-accelerated training environments, expediting model training and evaluation processes, resulting in a **50%** reduction in time-to-deployment.

Modernized core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js (NestJS/Express)** and **Python (FastAPI, Django)**, enhancing scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems.
Built interactive front-end applications with **React (18)**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **TypeScript**, utilizing **Redux Toolkit** and **Tailwind CSS** to create sleek, responsive interfaces for financial tools and admin panels.
Delivered real-time analytics dashboards with **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, providing operations teams with instant insights into transactions and anomalies.
Designed and deployed a robust event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, ensuring asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments, alerts, and compliance.
Developed ETL pipelines for ingesting financial data from internal and third-party sources using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory**, supporting both batch and real-time processing.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** to integrate model inference into backend services.

Leveraged **Python** for robust data processing and machine learning solutions, enhancing e-commerce functionalities through effective application of **ML** and **AI** techniques.
Engaged in deep learning research, employing **Deep Learning** frameworks to analyze user data and optimize the customer experience.

Communicated complex technical information clearly to stakeholders and team members, ensuring alignment on project goals and strategies.

Applied techniques for model optimization and deployment, ensuring operational efficiency and performance metrics are met during live usage.
Developed algorithms for personalized recommendations that increased user engagement and improved conversion rates, contributing to improved business outcomes.
